alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 4:34PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Guadalupe, northwestern Wilson and southeastern Bexar Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near China Grove, or 8 miles east of Stinson Municipal Airport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, New Braunfels, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, Randolph AFB, Stinson Municipal Airport, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia, China Grove, Marion, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Zuehl, Calaveras Lake, Converse, Sandy Oaks and Martinez. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
